Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We're offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an excellent chance to secure such a high-quality product at a discounted rate. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
